state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. Your first objective is to attempt to go south. And then, travel west. Next, make an attempt to venture west. Okay, and then, head west. After that, travel west. Then, try to go to the north. After that, go north. With that done, try to take a trip east. Next, try to travel east. With that over with, venture north. Then, assure that the passageway is wide open. After opening the passageway, take a trip west. And then, make an attempt to take a trip west. With that done, pick-up the fondue from the floor of the closet. Alright, thanks! -= Spare Room =- Fancy seeing you here. Here, by the way, being the spare room. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Spare Room =-0/1
next_state: -= Shower =- You find yourself in a shower. A typical kind of place. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a safe. You can make out a locked box. You can see a board. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Shower =-0/2
